mapper.sql: ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE, OWNER_NAME, OWNER_MOBILE, AREA, ADDRESS, COMPANY_TYPE, CREDIT_CODE, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_NAME, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_ID_CARD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_MOBILE, MANAGER_EMAIL, INVOICE_TYPE, BUSINESSLICENSE_IMAGE, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_ID_CARD_IMAGE, LAND_OWNERSHIP_IMAGE, MANAGER_ID_CARD_IMAGE, OTHER_IMAGE, MOBILE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into `t_temporary_water` (CUSTOMER_TYPE, OWNER_NAME, OWNER_MOBILE, AREA, ADDRESS, COMPANY_TYPE, CREDIT_CODE, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_NAME, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_ID_CARD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_MOBILE, MANAGER_EMAIL, INVOICE_TYPE, BUSINESSLICENSE_IMAGE, CORPORATE_REPRESEN_ID_CARD_IMAGE, LAND_OWNERSHIP_IMAGE, MANAGER_ID_CARD_IMAGE, OTHER_IMAGE, MOBILE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG ) values (#{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateRepresenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateRepresenIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicenseImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateRepresenIdCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{landOwnershipImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerIdCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0 )
mapper.select: select OWNER_NAME,CREDIT_CODE,OWNER_MOBILE from t_temporary_water where CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
